Detailed Description

Blocks are solid, nonmoving bits of terrain.

Member Data Documentation

block.Block.adjacencySignature

Adjacency signatures are a short way of indicating which of the 8 neighboring spaces are occupied by blocks.

block.Block.flavor

The specific sub-type of terrain, e.g.

"grass", or "lava".

block.Block.orientation

There are currently 20 different block orientations, most of which have a square collision polygon.

block.Block.sprite

To allow blocks to be animated, we use Sprites for drawing them.

block.Block.terrain

Which large-scale grouping this block falls into, e.g.

"jungle" or "hotzone".
